$interpreted: Devious: Holy Maiden, is the medicine working?
Misa: Yes...I...I...think it's a little better...
Devious: Wonderful. Your health is more important than anything.
Misa: High Priest, why...*cough*...! Why...is my body so weak...?
Misa: Like this...I...I won't be able...to save more people from their suffering...
Devious: ...Holy Maiden, this is a test from the Snake God.
Devious: You are able to carry this burden, this suffering. That is why he has chosen you, and given you this miraculous power!
Misa: I...see...*cough*...
Misa: I...I will...continue to work hard...for everybody...for the High Priest...
Devious: (Tsk, this child will soon be broken. Just like the rest...)
Devious: (It's about time to find a more useful puppet...)
Devious' Aide: Sir, a famous painter wishes to see you.
Devious: A painter? I am busy, send him away.
Devious' Aide: But he said he knows something about Queen Diana's secret...
Devious: Secret...?
Devious: Send him in.
Struggling Artist: High Priest, you...do you remember me?
Devious: ......
Devious: Loyal believer, of course I remember you.
Struggling Artist: Please forgive me...about the eradication of the Juan family years ago. I thought I would be implicated, so I went into hiding.
Struggling Artist: I thought I would be in hiding forever...and never return to the Shrine, but...recently, my heart has been uneasy.
Devious: (Eradication of the Juan family? Before Diana became queen.)
Devious: (During the struggle for the throne? Who is this painter?)
Struggling Artist: I-I originally wanted to keep this secret hidden for the rest of my life...
Struggling Artist: But...the tyranny of the Queen, I can't bear to watch it anymore! So...I've decided! To speak the truth!
Devious: Hssss...
Devious: Loyal believer of the Snake God, no matter what secret you hide, God will lissssten, be underssstanding, and guide you forward...
Devious: ...Something this big, I can't merely take your word for it.
Devious: Do you...have proof?
Struggling Artist: Of course! I kept one of the Juan's family portraits. Once you see the portrait, you'll definitely believe me!
Struggling Artist: Please, High Priest, take a look. It's this one...I painted this for the Juan family──their last family portrait!
Devious: You just mentioned...her finger...
Struggling Artist: If you look at the lizards in the photo, the Diana I saw then did not have a defect left hand when she removed her glove.
Struggling Artist: So the Queen today, with the deformed hand...
Devious: ...Who is she~Hssss...
Devious' Aide: High Priest, based on our research...
Devious' Aide: The signature, stamp, and frame all verify that this painting is an authentic...
Devious' Aide: ...Juan family portrait!
Devious: Hssss~That painter, has brought me quite the gift!
Devious: I never would have thought that the Queen was hiding such a massive secret...
Devious: Hsss...with this painting, everything has become so much easier~
Devious' Aide: High Priest, how should we deal with the painter?
Devious: Of course, we must offer our hospitalities...after all, he's the perfect witness.
Devious: Ah yes, have the painter paint a replica. General Lazer would certainly be delighted with such a gift, Hsss...
Devious: Who's there!?
Devious: You dare step onto my territory...? If you are sick of living, I don't mind assisting you!
Izumi: Woah woah, just a misunderstanding~It's just that last time I realized that this place is so mysterious, so I'm a little curious, that's all~
Izumi: We've known each other for so long, you know how I get~
Devious: Wipe that smile off your face. Are you deliberately picking a fight?
Izumi: Originally that was not the case, I was just trying to pass the time. But now I've found──
Izumi: Third Halo, you didn't hesitate to use your true power on me. Could it be...that what lies behind that door, is truly that important~?
Devious: I've turned a blind eye to your actions. Always sticking your nose in other's business; you dare meddle in mine?
Devious: Or perhaps I should remind the True Sun of the mess you caused in Atlas. That should have been reported to the sect long ago!
Izumi: ...*sigh*...If I had known earlier, I wouldn't have brought the Guardian to see you.
Devious: Hmph, the True Sun does not like those with many secrets.
Izumi: Ah yes...what you just said suits yourself well, doesn't it~
Izumi: However, I am very busy and do not wish to make a big deal of this. Let us both take a step back and not bother each other, what do you say?
Devious: I am faithful and loyal to the True Sun. Do not put us on equal terms, be gone!
Izumi: ......
Devious: The Dracontines are all a bunch of lowly rubbish. They forgot the glory of past Immortals long ago...
Devious: But that does not matter.
Devious: My desire will soon be fulfilled...
Devious: All I need is the power of Sdorica, and I──will be God!
Devious: Hssss...hahaha...HAHAHA...WAHAHA!!

Model.Text: Holy Maiden, is the medicine working?
Yes...I...I...think it's a little better...
Wonderful. Your health is more important than anything.
High Priest, why...*cough*...! Why...is my body so weak...?
Like this...I...I won't be able...to save more people from their suffering...
...Holy Maiden, this is a test from the Snake God.
You are able to carry this burden, this suffering. That is why he has chosen you, and given you this miraculous power!
I...see...*cough*...
I...I will...continue to work hard...for everybody...for the High Priest...
(Tsk, this child will soon be broken. Just like the rest...)
(It's about time to find a more useful puppet...)
Sir, a famous painter wishes to see you.
A painter? I am busy, send him away.
But he said he knows something about Queen Diana's secret...
Secret...?
Send him in.
High Priest, you...do you remember me?
Loyal believer, of course I remember you.
Please forgive me...about the eradication of the Juan family years ago. I thought I would be implicated, so I went into hiding.
I thought I would be in hiding forever...and never return to the Shrine, but...recently, my heart has been uneasy.
(Eradication of the Juan family? Before Diana became queen.)
(During the struggle for the throne? Who is this painter?)
I-I originally wanted to keep this secret hidden for the rest of my life...
But...the tyranny of the Queen, I can't bear to watch it anymore! So...I've decided! To speak the truth!
Hssss...
Loyal believer of the Snake God, no matter what secret you hide, God will lissssten, be underssstanding, and guide you forward...
...Something this big, I can't merely take your word for it.
Do you...have proof?
Of course! I kept one of the Juan's family portraits. Once you see the portrait, you'll definitely believe me!
Please, High Priest, take a look. It's this one...I painted this for the Juan family──their last family portrait!
You just mentioned...her finger...
If you look at the lizards in the photo, the Diana I saw then did not have a defect left hand when she removed her glove.
So the Queen today, with the deformed hand...
...Who is she~Hssss...
High Priest, based on our research...
The signature, stamp, and frame all verify that this painting is an authentic...
...Juan family portrait!
Hssss~That painter, has brought me quite the gift!
I never would have thought that the Queen was hiding such a massive secret...
Hsss...with this painting, everything has become so much easier~
High Priest, how should we deal with the painter?
Of course, we must offer our hospitalities...after all, he's the perfect witness.
Ah yes, have the painter paint a replica. General Lazer would certainly be delighted with such a gift, Hsss...
Who's there!?
You dare step onto my territory...? If you are sick of living, I don't mind assisting you!
Woah woah, just a misunderstanding~It's just that last time I realized that this place is so mysterious, so I'm a little curious, that's all~
We've known each other for so long, you know how I get~
Wipe that smile off your face. Are you deliberately picking a fight?
Originally that was not the case, I was just trying to pass the time. But now I've found──
Third Halo, you didn't hesitate to use your true power on me. Could it be...that what lies behind that door, is truly that important~?
I've turned a blind eye to your actions. Always sticking your nose in other's business; you dare meddle in mine?
Or perhaps I should remind the True Sun of the mess you caused in Atlas. That should have been reported to the sect long ago!
...*sigh*...If I had known earlier, I wouldn't have brought the Guardian to see you.
Hmph, the True Sun does not like those with many secrets.
Ah yes...what you just said suits yourself well, doesn't it~
However, I am very busy and do not wish to make a big deal of this. Let us both take a step back and not bother each other, what do you say?
I am faithful and loyal to the True Sun. Do not put us on equal terms, be gone!
The Dracontines are all a bunch of lowly rubbish. They forgot the glory of past Immortals long ago...
But that does not matter.
My desire will soon be fulfilled...
All I need is the power of Sdorica, and I──will be God!
Hssss...hahaha...HAHAHA...WAHAHA!!

Let us both take a step back and not bother each other, what do you say?","sfxName":"h0137s5_story_003_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0153_005_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Devious","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0153","IconName":"t0153s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I am faithful and loyal to the True Sun. Do not put us on equal terms, be gone!","sfxName":"t0153sx_story_021","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0153_005_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0137","IconName":"h0137s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0153_005_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Devious","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0153","IconName":"t0153s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The Dracontines are all a bunch of lowly rubbish. They forgot the glory of past Immortals long ago...","sfxName":"t0153sx_story_007","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0153_005_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Devious","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0153","IconName":"t0153s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But that does not matter.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0153_005_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Devious","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0153","IconName":"t0153s5_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"My desire will soon be fulfilled...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0153_005_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Devious","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0153","IconName":"t0153s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"All I need is the power of Sdorica, and I\u2500\u2500will be God!","sfxName":"t0153sx_story_010","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0153_005_dialog_english##_22_002","SpeakerName":"Devious","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0153","IconName":"t0153s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hssss...hahaha...HAHAHA...WAHAHA!!","sfxName":"t0153s5_victory_01","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
